entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -17.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 2:00 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -17.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -20.6°C

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 17.
